ainmear_fireann.note: Listed in Colin Mark’s dictionary as ‘journey’, ‘travel’.
Listed in Dwelly: Journey, voyage, journeying, voyaging, pilgrimage, travel, march. Gu taisteal nan tonn gàireach, to travelling of the foamy waves — Òran nam Fineachan, G 3, 4.
Listed in MacBain: taisdeal: a journey, [taisdil] (Cars.), journey (v.imp.) Ir. [taisdiol]: [*to-asdel], [*ad-sod-], root [sod-], as in [astar].
eDIL: taistel, taistell (taisdiol, taisdioll): travelling, traversing, visiting.
